product.name: Stress B Complex With C and E Tab
Stress B Complex With C, E and Iron Tab
Stress B Complex With C,e, Zinc and Copper
Stress B-complex Plus Iron With Vitamins C&e

mixture.name: Se-Natal
mixture.ingredients: Calcium carbonate + Cupric oxide + Cyanocobalamin + DL-alpha tocopheryl acetate + Docusate + Ergocalciferol + Ferrous fumarate + Folic acid + Niacin + Niacinamide ascorbate + Potassium Iodide + Pyridoxine + Riboflavin + Thiamine + Vitamin A + Zinc oxide

mixture.name: Se-Natal One
mixture.ingredients: Biotin + Calcium carbonate + Cholecalciferol + Cupric oxide + Cyanocobalamin + DL-alpha tocopheryl acetate + Ferrous fumarate + Folic acid + Magnesium oxide + Niacinamide ascorbate + Nicotinamide + Pantothenic acid + Pyridoxine + Riboflavin + Thiamine + Vitamin A + Zinc oxide

mixture.name: Stress B Complex With C,e, Zinc and Copper

mixture.name: Stress B-complex Plus Iron With Vitamins C&e

drug-interaction.name: Bortezomib
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Bortezomib can be decreased when used in combination with Niacinamide ascorbate.

drug-interaction.name: Deferoxamine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of Cardiovascular Impairment can be increased when Niacinamide ascorbate is combined with Deferoxamine.

drug-interaction.name: Chlorpropamide
drug-interaction.description: Niacinamide ascorbate may decrease the excretion rate of Chlorpropamide which could result in a higher serum level.

drug-interaction.name: Mecamylamine
drug-interaction.description: Niacinamide ascorbate may increase the excretion rate of Mecamylamine which could result in a lower serum level and potentially a reduction in efficacy.

drug-interaction.name: Diethylstilbestrol
drug-interaction.description: The serum concentration of Niacinamide ascorbate can be decreased when it is combined with Diethylstilbestrol.

drug-interaction.name: Chlorotrianisene
drug-interaction.description: The serum concentration of Niacinamide ascorbate can be decreased when it is combined with Chlorotrianisene.
